Let's Talk

##### Services

# Energy Tax Credits & Incentives

Home » Services » Tax Services » Tax Credits & Incentives Advisory » Energy
Tax Credits & Incentives

## Is Your Business Eligible for Energy Tax Credits or Deductions?

Cherry Bekaert’s Energy Tax Credits and Incentives team is able to assess your
organization’s eligibility to receive business energy tax credits and
incentives, so that you are not leaving any money on the table. If your
business makes investments in the following activities, then you may beneﬁt
from energy efficiency federal, state, and local energy tax credit and
incentives:

  * Constructing new facilities or improving existing facilities using energy-efficient technologies

  * Obtaining LEED® certiﬁcation for new or existing buildings Renewable energy investment tax credit
  * Manufacturing equipment and products that are used to produce renewable energy
  * Cleaning up environmentally challenged properties
  * Conducting research and development (R&D) or improving processes that relate to energy efficiency, environmental improvements, and pollution control

## What Energy Tax Credits Are Available?

## Federal Energy Tax Credits and Incentives

  * R&D tax credits attempt to develop or improve energy-related products or processes
  * Investment tax credit for qualiﬁed energy property (e.g., solar, fuel cell, small wind energy property, geothermal, micro-turbine, etc.)
  * Section 179D Energy Efficient Commercial Buildings Deduction (Section 179D) for owners and designers of energy efficient commercial buildings
  * Section 45L New Energy Efficient Home Credit (Section 45L)
  * The Treasury Department provides energy grants for renewable energy producers and for manufacturers of products used to produce renewable energy
  * Accelerated depreciation for alternative energy and biomass properties

## State and Local Energy Tax Credit Incentives

  * State and local renewable energy investment tax credits and grants related to renewable energy production
  * Energy tax credits for energy-efficient commercial buildings
  * Rebates from local utilities and development authorities for energy-efficient improvements
  * R&D tax credits for attempts to develop or improve energy-related products or processes

Talk to our team today and see what energy investment tax credit and
incentives may still be available to you.

Contact Our Energy Tax Credits & Incentives Team

## $2M Saved by Using the 179D Tax Deduction

Trust Cherry Bekaert’s Energy Tax Credits & Incentives team for a high degree
of due diligence and a smooth application process.

Learn More

“Cherry Bekaert” is the brand name under which Cherry Bekaert LLP and Cherry
Bekaert Advisory LLC, independently owned entities, provide professional
services in an alternative practice structure in accordance with applicable
professional standards. Cherry Bekaert LLP is a licensed CPA firm that
provides attest services, and Cherry Bekaert Advisory LLC and its subsidiary
entities provide tax and advisory services. View Full Firm Disclosure

“Cherry Bekaert” is the brand name under which Cherry Bekaert LLP and Cherry
Bekaert Advisory LLC provide professional services.

Cherry Bekaert LLP and Cherry Bekaert Advisory LLC practice in an alternative
practice structure in accordance with the AICPA Code of Professional Conduct
and applicable law, regulations and professional standards. Cherry Bekaert LLP
is a licensed independent CPA firm that provides attest services to its
clients, and Cherry Bekaert Advisory LLC and its subsidiary entities provide
tax and business advisory services to their clients. Cherry Bekaert Advisory
LLC and its subsidiary entities are not licensed CPA firms.

The entities falling under the Cherry Bekaert brand are independently owned
and are not liable for the services provided by any other entity providing
services under the Cherry Bekaert brand. Our use of the terms “our Firm” and
“we” and “us” and terms of similar import, denote the alternative practice
structure of Cherry Bekaert LLP and Cherry Bekaert Advisory LLC.
